mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID AS ID, MENU_NM AS TEXT, UP_MENU_ID AS PARENT, MENU_URL AS URL, MENU_TYPE, 'unit' AS TYPE FROM CMN_MENU_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMN_MENU_INFO ( ROLE_ID, ROLE_NM, ROLE_TYPE, ROLE_SORT, DESCRIPTION, ROLE_MENU, CREATE_ID, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{roleId}, #{roleNm}, #{roleType}, ${roleSort}, #{description}, NULL, #{userId}, SYSDATE(), NULL, NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE CMN_ROLE_INFO SET ROLE_ID = #{roleId}, ROLE_NM = #{roleNm}, ROLE_TYPE = #{roleType}, ROLE_SORT = ${roleSort}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, UPDATE_ID = #{userId}, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
